entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
